title: News story telling: events and issues
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Production and direction

description: Episode number 14 of Series "Video tech". This program allows the viewer to consolidate the lessons of earlier episodes and to apply them to the production of a news story. We follow the actual coverage of a news story from the beginnings of researching and planning the story, to shooting on location and then the final editing and screening.
